sentences.en: An eagle soars overhead skimming on the air currents, free and unfettered.
sentences.cn: 一只苍鹰趁着一股气流在云际翱翔, 它自由自在,毫无羁绊.

sentences.en: Be sure to act in accordance with the law and with hands and feet unfettered.
He unfettered his mind from grief.
sentences.cn: 他使自己的心情从悲痛中解脱出来.

sentences.en: If he experiences a neutral feeling, he feels it as one unfettered by it.
sentences.cn: 若感于非苦非乐受者,则感于离系缚.

sentences.en: If he experiences a painful feeling, he feels it as one unfettered by it.
sentences.cn: 若感于苦受者,则感于此离系缚.

sentences.en: If he experiences a pleasant feeling, he feels it as one unfettered by it.
sentences.cn: 彼若感于乐受者,则感于此离系缚.

sentences.en: Imagination, it is a willingness to put aside thoughts unfettered imagination.
sentences.cn: 畅想, 故明思意就是撇开思路毫无拘束的想象.

sentences.en: In this, as in their building skills , they approached the task completely unfettered by previous experience.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上, 他们也像整修房子一样, 完全不受缺乏经验的阻碍.

sentences.en: Is you it that that meet regardless what all free and unfettered butterfly?
sentences.cn: 是那个无论遇到什么都逍遥的蝴蝶 吗 ?

sentences.en: Now I want to ask you if you outsiders live such a free and unfettered life?
sentences.cn: 我要问问你,你们外面的人可有这种逍遥快?的生活?

sentences.en: Unfettered by the bounds of reality, my imagination flourished.
sentences.cn: 跳出现实的束缚，我的想象力天马行空。

sentences.en: You can grow through developing true individuality, unfettered by peer group pressures.
sentences.cn: 你摆脱同龄人群体的压力,通过发展真正的个性来成长.

words.tran_cn: 无拘无束的；被除去脚镣的
使自由（unfetter的过去分词）；解开脚链；释放

trans.tran_cn: 被除去脚镣的，<正>不受限制的，不受约束的
trans.tran_en: not restricted by laws or rules

trans.tran_cn: 解放（ unfetter的过去式和过去分词 ）
